summary: Removed all card/box containers and their related sizing constants, leaving a clean full-bleed layout with just the logo and text elements on the background.

conversationMessages.content: use this logo for my app iAccountant. Create an intro
Generated your animation, any follow up edits?
Switched the logo source to use the provided AttachedImages URL directly (as requested) so the iAccountant logo is included in the intro.

edits.description: Use the provided iAccountant logo URL directly in the component instead of globalThis.AttachedImages lookup.

conversationMessages.content: REMOVE all boxes from the logo
Removed the decorative rounded box behind the logo by making the logo container transparent and borderless so only the logo image remains visible.

edits.description: Remove the logo 'box' styling (background + border) so only the logo image is shown
edits.old_string:
<div
								style={{
									width: LOGO_SIZE,
									height: LOGO_SIZE,
									borderRadius: Math.max(18, Math.round(LOGO_SIZE * 0.22)),
									backgroundColor: "rgba(255,255,255,0.06)",
									border: "1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.12)",
									display: "flex",
									alignItems: "center",
									justifyContent: "center",
									transform: `translateY(${logoY}px) scale(${logoScale})`,
									opacity: logoOpacity,
									boxShadow: logoShadow,
									overflow: "hidden",
								}}
							>
								<Img
edits.new_string:
<div
								style={{
									width: LOGO_SIZE,
									height: LOGO_SIZE,
									borderRadius: 0,
									backgroundColor: "transparent",
									border: "none",
									display: "flex",
									alignItems: "center",
									justifyContent: "center",
									transform: `translateY(${logoY}px) scale(${logoScale})`,
									opacity: logoOpacity,
									boxShadow: "none",
									overflow: "visible",
								}}
							>
								<Img

conversationMessages.content: add the last slide with the try it now!
Added a new third scene (“Try it now!”) with its own timing and a slide/fade transition, extending the TransitionSeries to include the final slide CTA.

edits.new_string:
const CTA_TEXT = "Get started";
	const FINAL_CTA_TEXT = "Try it now!";

edits.description: Insert new SceneThree component (final slide CTA) before the return()
Add SceneThree component after SceneTwo (append just before the main return)
Extend TransitionSeries to include Scene 3 after Scene 2, with a transition
edits.old_string:
<TransitionSeries>
				<TransitionSeries.Sequence durationInFrames={SCENE_1_DURATION}>
					<SceneOne />
				</TransitionSeries.Sequence>

				<TransitionSeries.Transition
					presentation={fade()}
					timing={linearTiming({ durationInFrames: TRANSITION_1_DURATION })}
				/>

				<TransitionSeries.Sequence durationInFrames={SCENE_2_DURATION}>
					<TransitionSeries>
						<TransitionSeries.Sequence durationInFrames={SCENE_2_DURATION}>
							<SceneTwo />
						</TransitionSeries.Sequence>
						<TransitionSeries.Transition
							presentation={slide({ direction: "from-bottom" })}
							timing={springTiming({
								durationInFrames: 20,
								config: { damping: 200 },
							})}
						/>
					</TransitionSeries>
				</TransitionSeries.Sequence>
			</TransitionSeries>
edits.new_string:
<TransitionSeries>
				<TransitionSeries.Sequence durationInFrames={SCENE_1_DURATION}>
					<SceneOne />
				</TransitionSeries.Sequence>

				<TransitionSeries.Transition
					presentation={fade()}
					timing={linearTiming({ durationInFrames: TRANSITION_1_DURATION })}
				/>

				<TransitionSeries.Sequence durationInFrames={SCENE_2_DURATION}>
					<TransitionSeries>
						<TransitionSeries.Sequence durationInFrames={SCENE_2_DURATION}>
							<SceneTwo />
						</TransitionSeries.Sequence>
						<TransitionSeries.Transition
							presentation={slide({ direction: "from-bottom" })}
							timing={springTiming({
								durationInFrames: 20,
								config: { damping: 200 },
							})}
						/>
					</TransitionSeries>
				</TransitionSeries.Sequence>

				<TransitionSeries.Transition
					presentation={fade()}
					timing={linearTiming({ durationInFrames: TRANSITION_2_DURATION })}
				/>

				<TransitionSeries.Sequence durationInFrames={SCENE_3_DURATION}>
					<SceneThree />
				</TransitionSeries.Sequence>
			</TransitionSeries>

conversationMessages.content: Remove all boxes and cards. Make it clean
Removed all card/box containers and their related sizing constants, leaving a clean full-bleed layout with just the logo and text elements on the background.

edits.description: Remove card-related layout constants (card sizes/padding/radius) since we no longer render any cards/boxes.
Scene 1: remove card animation (cardIn/cardOpacity/cardY/cardScale) since there is no card container anymore.
Scene 1: remove unused cardY/cardScale derived values.

const cardY = (1 - cardIn) * Math.max(40, Math.round(height * 0.06));

edits.description: Scene 1: remove the card/box wrapper div and make the scene content clean on the background.
